createIdentity(string,uint256).details: Function to create a new identity

params.identityOwner: The address of the identity to be deleted

getAllIdentities().details: Function to get details of all identities

returns._0: An array of Identity structs representing all identities

params.identityOwner: The address of the identity to be revoked

params.newAge: The new age of the identity
params.newName: The new name of the identity

params.identityOwner: The address of the identity to be verified
